name: BattlePan's Odyssey
description:
What is BattlePan’s Odyssey?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

“When The Paladin slays the ugly monster, The Necromancer resurrects the skulls, The Barbarian chops the bandit’s head, and The Rogue flirts with the chief and kills him in his sleep.. What does a BattlePan do? He cooks.”

BattlePan’s Odyssey is a journey of a young cook from a heroes guild. He started his journey when The Grand Chef of the guild got sick, and he is next on the line to replace him as the next Grand Chef. In this Action-RPG, procedurally-generated dungeon-crawling, hack ‘n slash game, you must explore the world to fulfill his quest, and you have to cook a dish before entering new area or dungeon.

Remember, breakfast is important!

How to Play

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Up Arrow - Move Up

Down Arrow - Move Down

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Z - Normal Attack

X - Normal Dash

A - Special Attack

S - Special Dash

W - Inventory

F - Use Item

You can cook in your camp to get special buffs for your character.

Get ingredients for cooking by beating monsters!

After eating, do some work out by going to the arena!

You can return to camp after beating all monsters.

Cook 4 times to see a special art from our artist!

BattlePan’s Odyssey is created during an internal game jam in Toge Productions
